video.description:
The result of Mikey Alfred, Aaron Brown, and The FADER team's efforts has finally arrived: a genre-bending, unexpected short that takes you on a wild tour of Illegal Civilization's Los Angeles, one that basks in the same slumming angels and sun-blinded sidewalks as Raymond Chandler's noirs, but fits squarely into the optimism and motivation of Mikey Alfred and Illegal Civilization.

Check out the full feature on The Fader here: http://www.thefader.com/2016/03/03/illegal-civilization-film

Director: Aaron Brown
Producer: Robert Semmer, Brande Bytheway, Mikey Alfred
Executive Producer: Joseph Patel
Executive Producers: Jon Cohen, Andy Cohn, Anthony Holland, Rob Stone
Associate Producer: Madison LaClair
Co-Production: The FADER, Focus Creeps, Illegal Civilization
Written by: Mikey Alfred and Aaron Brown
Story by: Mikey Alfred, Aaron Brown, Brook Linder
Cinematography: Frank Mobilio
Editor: Brook Linder
Production Design: Carlos Laszlo
Sound Recordists: Emmet Casey, Jake Viator, Molly Young
First Assistant Camera: Rachel Fox
Production Assistant: Eric Estrada
Visual Effects and Compositing: Paul LaBerge
Title Design Graphics: Madison Bullard
Score and Sound Mix: Zach Goheen at High Lonesome
Colorist: Gregory Reese at The Mill
